title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view.
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

Observed behavior (OB): The focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view, preventing the selection of any other item at the first attempt.

Expected behavior (EB): When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the item should be selected without the focus jumping to the library file node.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item in the outline view.

The selected item should be highlighted and the focus should not jump to the library file node.
